description:
Emilia tried to warn the villagers of Arlam that danger was coming and they should evacuate, but was not well-received. As she`s pondering what more she can do, Wilhelm arrives at the mansion with a message... Subaru and Julius face off against Betelgeuse`s Unseen Hand. However, as one Unseen Hand after another is launched their way, the two heroes find themselves completely on the defensive.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Der selbsternannte und der allerbeste Ritter
Director`s Cut: The Self-Proclaimed Knight and the Greatest of Knights / That`s All This Story Is About / A Moment in the Carriage
Jijou Kishi to Saiyuu no Kishi / Tada Sore dake no Monogatari / Ryuusha de no Hitotoki
Samozwańczy rycerz i najznamienitszy rycerz / Ta historia była właśnie o tym
自称騎士と最優の騎士 / ただそれだけの物語 / 竜車でのひと時
감독판: 자칭 기사와 최우의 기사 / 단지 그뿐인 이야기
